name: A Voice in the Dark
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: An opponent chooses one: Put a random card from your graveyard into your hand; or draw a card.
"You really shouldn't have done that." - Matthias Lehner

name: Aggressive Infiltration
effect: Talent: Combat
"Get in there and do as much damage as you can. That's what you're good at, right?" - Garrosh Hellscream

name: Alard Schmied
effect: This ally has +X [Health], where X is the combined [Armor] of Plate armor you control.
"As you can see, my work speaks for itself; my patrons are still alive to talk."

name: All Aboard for Undercity!
effect: Each player puts a [Horde] ally from his graveyard into his hand.
"Next stop, Tirisfal Glades!" - Frezza

name: Anarchist Bladewalker
effect:
Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
When this ally enters play, she may deal X melee damage to target hero or ally.
"I'm finished with you, chump!"

name: Anduros Silversong
effect: This ally can't attack heroes.
"Elune may be the Goddess of the Moon, but even the Moon has a dark side."

name: Arcane Burst
effect: Talent: Arcane
"There's plenty for everyone!" - Nicholas Merrick

name: Arcane Tactics
effect: Talent: Arcane
Arcane magic is the quintessential combination of spell power and efficiency.

name: Archduke Franklin Pearce
effect: 3, Discard a card ==> Put target equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.
"Our plan for success is in motion. Now, let's see what develops."

name: Arm Blade of Augelmir
effect: When this weapon enters play, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.
One of the many treasures guarded closely by the vyrkul of Utgarde Keep.

name: Army of the Dead
effect: Talent: Unholy
"You're no use to me alive." - Saeryn Dusksorrow

name: Astral Denial
effect: Talent: Arcane
"Let me give you a life lesson: never put all your eggs in one basket." Spellweaver Jihan

name: Auryna the Lightsworn
effect: Talent: Retribution
Professions: Blacksmithing, Jewelcrafting
"When it comes to the unjust, the Light has a very long memory."

name: Azamoth Deathfang
effect: 2, Discard a card ==> This ally deals 1 shadow damage to target ally.
"You are worthless! All I need to do is point, and your life will be forfeit."

name: Azjol-anak Acidslinger
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
This ally has +1 / +1 while an equipment is in your graveyard.
Than venom is so toxic that it can paralyze even a Dragon in a matter of seconds.

name: Azjol-anak Acidspewer
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
This ally has +1 / +1 while an equipment is in your graveyard.
They prefer when their prey tries to flee.

name: Azjol-anak Battleguard
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
This ally has +1 / +1 while an ally is in your graveyard.
Guardians bred for a single purpose: protect Kilix the Unraveler, no matter the cost.

name: Azjol-anak Broodguard
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other repuations in your deck.)
This ally has +1/+1 while an ally is in your graveyard.
The Broodguards of Azjol-anak are ruthless in the defense of their fellow Nerubians.

name: Azjol-anak Webspinner
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other repuations in your deck.)
This ally has +1/+1 while an ability is in your graveyard.
Ironically, if you don't close the distance quickly, you may soon find yourself unable to escape.

name: Azjol-anak Webweaver
effect:
Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.)
This ally has +1 / +1 while an ability is in your graveyard.
The intricate webs that they weave are most beautiful when viewed from a distance.

name: Belligerence
effect: Talent: Combat

name: Berserk
effect: Talent: Feral
"I'm pretty sure we should run now. . ." - Grumpherys

name: Besora Galefeather
effect: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)
"A favorable wind blows this day. It is a sign of things to come."

name: Blade of the Empty Void
effect: While this weapon is in your graveyard, your hero has Protector.
Its dark magic penetrates well beyond the bounds of the mortal realm.

name: Blessing of Cenarius
effect: Talent: Restoration
"Cenarius's blessings offer more than the simple mending of flesh and bone." - Arktos

name: Blessing of Liberty
effect: Talent: Protection
"You have my protection. Allay your fear and charge!" - Vakeron

name: Bloodbane's Fall
effect: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)
This cloak of Orbaz Bloodbane imbues the wearer with his latent aggression.

name: Bloody Grip
effect: Talent: Blood, Arms
"Within all of us burns a desire to do more with ourselves. . ." - Ivan, Bladewind Brute

name: Blythe the Pyromaniac
effect: Talent: Fire
Professions: Tailoring, Inscription
"I was brought back for a reason - to see the Lich King and his armies burned from the face of Azeroth!"

name: Bombard
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Strategy gave way to chaos as a hail of arrows littered the battlefield.

name: Boon of Light
effect: Talent: Holy
"Every boon the Light offers has bountiful rewards for its true believers." - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Boots of the Whirling Mist
effect:
[Druid] Hero: [Activate] ==> Remove your hero from combat.
[Rogue] Hero: [Activate] ==> Interrupt target ability that's targeting your hero.
"Feet, don't fail me now!"

name: Bordrak Barrelblast
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Professions: Leatherworking, Inscription
"Lead those monstrosities to my sights, lad! I'll make sure there's nothing left for the Lich King to resurrect!"

name: Breastplate of Undeath
effect:
This armor enters play with five +1 [Armor] counters.
At the start of your turn, remove a +1 [Armor] counter. If none remain, destroy this armor.
"Borrowed power lasts but a brief time; make of it what you will." - Valeos Chillheart

name: Broderick Langforth
effect: When this ally is in your graveyard, your hero has Assault 1.
"Alive, dead, undead . . . It matters not to me."

name: Brothers in Death
effect:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
"Tear that keep asunder, death knight. Find Koltira!" - Thassarian

name: Buzz
effect:
When this ally enters play, you may destroy target equipment.
Death Rattle When this ally enters your graveyad from anywhere): You may destroy target weapon.
The squasher has suddenly become the squashee.

name: Call of the Grove
effect: Talent: Restoration
"The plague of undeath is a constant threat to our ongoing mission of preservation." - Lanthus the Restorer

name: Charles Worth
effect: This ally has Mend X, where X is the combined [Armor] of Cloth armor you control.
"The right clothes make all the difference."

name: Chimera Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
"And now, to add that special finishing touch . . ." - Levander of the Sanguine Shot

name: Claemora Amberglare
effect: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn. (+2 ATK on your turn)
Her looks are all the distration her allies need to land a killing blow.

name: Conflagration Trap
effect: Talent: Survival
"Sometimes you need to burn the forest down to find your prey." - Kana Nassis

name: Conqueror Gurzom
effect: Prevent all damage that Rogues would deal to this ally.
"I've got my eye on you!"

name: Conqueror Jarano
effect: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target [Death Knight] ability or equipment.
"You are no Arthas, death knight. Your powers will not protect you from the Earth Mother."

name: Conqueror Neusuada
effect: When this ally attacks, you may destroy target non-hero Warlock or [Warlock] equipment.
"Fear THIS."

name: Conqueror Yun'zon
effect: Opposing Warriors and [Warrior] cards in play lose and can't have powers.
"Da fire power gonna blast yoo apart, bruddah."

name: Corpse Explosion
effect: Talent: Unholy
"This existence is not without its perks." - Triton the Sacrilegious

name: Corruptor Mimi Whippleshade
effect: At the start of your turn, this ally deals 3 shadow damage to each opposing hero for each Disease attached to that hero.
"It's good to be back, and I'd like to keep it that way."

name: Crimson Cranium Crusher
effect: When an opposing resource turns face down, you may draw a card.
"Press the advantage, kid, or you'll never be the Amphitheater of Anguish champ!" - Gurgthock

name: Crippling Strike
effect: Talent: Unholy, Survival
"You are nothing short of clueless." - Boum Headshot

name: Culling the Damned
effect:
Reveal any number of cards from your hand and pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you revealed an ability, draw a card.
If you revealed an ally, draw a card.
If you revealed an equipment, draw a card.
"Hearing their screams, watching the last life fade from their wretched bodies. . .it's invigorating, is it not?" - Serinar

name: Dagger of Betrayal
effect: On your turn: [Activate] ==> Target opponent chooses an ally he controls. Exchange control of that ally and this weapon.
"Bargaining with rogues is like inviting a fox to live in your hen house." - Pappy Ironbane

name: Danyssa Stillheart
effect: 1, Discard a card ==> Target hero or ally has -1 [Health] this turn.
"In life I sought to heal all wounds, but in death I seek to further them."

name: Dark Horizon
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. If a hero or ally you controlled dealt shadow ([Shadow]) damage this turn, draw another card.
"Freshly scourged, eh? Ya still be reekin' of da living!" - Overlord Drakuru

name: Dark Penance
effect: Talent: Shadow
"The cost is irrelevant. Only the outcome truly matters." - Omedus the Punisher

name: Dead Weight
effect: Talent: Assassination
"Some rogues like to disarm their opponents. I find it's much easier to totally rid them of their arms." - Ressa Shadshine

name: Deadly Throw
effect: Talent: Assassination
"Try to run, I dare you." - Umbrage

name: Death and Decay
effect: Talent: Unholy
"It's not hard to track a death knight, mon. Just follow the devastation." - The Longeye

name: Death Pact
effect: Talent: Blood
"Your services are no longer required." - Drandus the Deathcaller

name: Death to the Traitor King
effect:
Nerubian Reputation
On your turn: Declare an opposing hero or ally the Traitor King this turn and pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 while attacking the Traitor King this turn.
"Bring an end to the traitor king's reign. You will be doing a great service to both of our people." - Kilix the Unraveller

name: Death Wish
effect: Talent: Fury
"I'd rather fight and die than spend the rest of my days stewing in my cowardice." - Boarguts the Impaler

name: Death's Gaze
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have fewer cards in your hand than in your graveyard, draw a card.
"This is a death's gaze orb. With it, we can observe the Scourge's actions and decide how best to strike." - Darkrider Arly

name: Deathcharger
effect:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, target opposing hero or ally has -3 [Health] this turn.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
Deathchargers will serve only those who have no remorse.

name: Debilitating Shout
effect: Talent: Fury
"This will strike fear into their hearts, and keep it there long after we're gone." - Bloody Mary

name: Defiling the Defilers
effect:
If allies you controlled dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards.
"Destroy the runes. . .stamp them out and ensure that the Cult will not have access to whatever power that they've accumulated there." - Serinar

name: Delusions of Grandeur
effect: Talent: Shadow
"Let me readjust your perception of reality." - Emerson Zantides

name: Detonate Soul
effect: Talent: Affliction
"Remember to share this with your friends. They are sure to enjoy it, too." - Felbender Lara

name: Devouring Plague
effect: Talent: Shadow
"When the shadows are through with you, there will be nothing left, not even your bones." - Deacon Markus Hallow

name: Diane Cannings
effect: This ally has Assault X, where X is the combined [Armor] of Leather and Mail armor you control.
"Flexibility in your armor plays a crucial part in making your attacks even more devastating."

name: Disarm Trap
effect: Talent: Subtlety
"At least cover it with leaves or something, Azarak. It's like you're not even trying." - Dralor

name: Dispersion
effect: Talent: Shadow

name: Divine Storm
effect: Talent: Retribution
"The Light infuses me with righteous power! My cause is just!" - Justice Blindburn

name: Dragonflight Great-Ring
effect: At the start of your turn, destroy target hero.
"It was locked awat in the cache of Ley-Guardian Eregos for a reason." - Telrander

name: Drandus the Deathcaller
effect:
Protector
Ghouls you control have Assault 2.
"Obey the word of your master, or I will return you to the grave myself."

name: Dreadstead
effect:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
"The subjugation of a Xorothian Dreadsteed is a true measure of power." - Mor'zul Bloodbringer

name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
effect:
On your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put target Demon ally from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.
"This quest will be perilous, but a warlock of your stature does not stray from danger!" - Mor'zul Bloodbringer

name: Earthshaper Javuun
effect:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
"The earth has just as much reason to repel the shadows as the Light does."

name: Edge of Oblivion
effect:
This weapon enters play with five +1 ATK counters.
At the start of your turn, remove a +1 ATK counter. If none remain, destroy this weapon.
"Death is at your doorway, and it's coming inside whether you like it or not." - Victoria Jaton

name: Emelia Darkhand
effect:
Protector
This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.
"Our troubles lie abroad, where the armies of the Lich King dwell. That is where the true challenge awaits."

name: Emerson Zantides
effect: Talent: Shadow
Professions: Tailoring, Jewelcrafting
"Those who wish to fight against the Scourge must be willing to sacrifice life and limb."

name: Encrusted Zombie Finger
effect: When your hero attacks, yo umay point and make a Zombie noise. If you do, this weapon has Assault 1 this turn.
"Unnnnngggggnnnn. . ."

name: Enveloping Shadows
effect: Talent: Subtlety
"Subterfuge is what separates the dead rogues from the live ones." - Ravenna

name: Erondra Frostmoon
effect: Talent: Unholy
Professions: Blacksmithing, Inscription
"Your screams for mercy will not save you, for Elune no longer guides my blade."

name: Extract of Necromantic Power
effect:
As each turn starts,
[Warlock] Hero: Prevent the next 3 melee ([Melee]) damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.
[Death Knight] Hero: Prevent the next 3 non-melee damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

name: Fang
effect:
Protector
Allies you control have Assault 1.
The strength of the wolf is the pack, and the strength of the pack is the wolf.

name: Farander Shadesurge
effect: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
"Embrace the darkness, and you shall be made whole."

name: Felbender Lara
effect: Talent: Affliction
Professions: Tailoring, Alchemy
"What kind of curse is undeath if it falls so easily before my incantations?"

name: Feline Grace
effect: Talent: Feral
"You're lucky if you realize what's going on before you're nothing more than a chew toy." - Gyro of the Ring

name: Feral Spirit
effect: Talent: Enhancement
"The road to victory will require a suitable guide." - Kinivus the Focused

name: Ferandus Duskfall
effect:
Protector
When this ally defends, you may ready target weapon.
"It's so easy to strip away this strength you claim to have."

name: Field Commander Foggo
effect: 1, Discard a card ==> This turn, friendly heroes and allies can protect this ally.
"Stop standing there and do something useful."

name: Firewarden Wyland Kaslinth
effect: Assault 1 (+1 ATK on your turn)
"You go channel that rage. . .I'll channel something more interesting."

name: Fleshwerk Throwing Glaive
effect:
Thrown
[Rogue] Hero: This weapon has +1 ATK.
[Warrior] Hero: You pay 1 less to strike with this weapon.
Different styles produce different results.

name: Flint Shadowmore
effect: If this ally would deal combat damage, he may deal that much divided as you choose among any number of opposing heroes and/or allies instead.
"Nathanos must pay for what he has done to the other SI:7 agents."

name: Freeze
effect: Talent: Frost
"You didn't really think I was going to let you hit me, did you?" - Vor'na the Disciplined

name: Frost Burst
effect: Talent: Frost, Elemental
"Slowly, surely, inevitably. . .death comes." - Saeryn Dusksorrow

name: Galvanize
effect: Talent: Unholy, Balance
"Bringing the inanimate and the dead to life wasn't enough?" - Kileana the Inferno

name: Garrosh Hellscream
effect:
Protector
Each ally you control has Assault X, where X is its printed ATK.
"The Lich King sought to sow the seeds of fear. Let me be the first to show him the Horde fears nothing!"

name: Gathering of Wits
effect: Talent: Shadow
"They are nothing but sheep - easily guided, even to their deaths." - Martiana the Mindwrench

name: Gavel of the Fleshcrafter
effect: Your hero has Mend 3. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 3 damage from target hero or ally.)
"I don't want to know how many experiments it took to make this thing . . ." - Katianna the Shrouded

name: Ginza Darktusk
effect:
Protector
This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.
"Faith in your friends will be your undoin', mon."

name: Great Elekk
effect:
Draenei Hero Required
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, this turn, if your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +2 instead.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
Native to Draenor, the chosen mount of the Draenei inspires all those who ride it.

name: Great Kodo
effect:
Tauren Hero Required
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, you may exhaust target card in play.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
Tauren riding Kodos give new meaning to the word "stampede."

name: Greaves of Ancient Evil
effect:
When damage is prevented with this armor,
[Death Knight] Hero: Ready a weapon you control.
[Paladin] Hero: Ready another armor you control.
[Warrior] Hero: Ready your hero.
"What better way to kick some arse than with these?" - Triton the Sacrilegious

name: Gregory Flamewaker
effect: Assault 3 (+3 ATK on your turn)
"Not enough for you?"

name: Grovemender Ash'lon
effect:
Mend 3 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 3 damage from target hero or ally.)
When this ally heals damage, you may draw a card.
"We must embrace the Earth Mother if we are to rid the land of the Scourge."

name: Gushing Wound
effect: Talent: Arms
"Take all the time you need. . .or have left." - Bulkas Wildhorn

name: Hammer of the Divine
effect: Talent: Protection
Even the most powerful Scourge will be brought to their knees in the presence of the Light.

name: Haranto Darkstrider
effect:
Protector
This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.
"The time has come to shift our concentration from the Alliance to the frozen north."

name: Haunt
effect: Talent: Affliction

name: High Magus Euli
effect:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 fire damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way loses and can't have powers this turn.
"Trickery is a resource of those devoid of power."

name: Horatio Plaguetouch
effect: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)
"The whispers in my ear are those of the Nether, hungering for your energy."

name: Hulstom, Servant of the Light
effect:
Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
"I have learned how to withstand the crushing blows of shadow, but I still have so much to learn."

name: Human Shield
effect: Talent: Protection
"I've got you covered." - Warrax

name: Huro'shal Gutwrench
effect: When this ally is dealt damage, you may destroy target ability.
"Smash, smash, smash - dis be too much fun."

name: Hurricane
effect: Talent: Balance

name: Huzrula
effect: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
"I can help you with that."

name: Icy Torment
effect: Talent: Frost
"The frozen touch of death will take your strength, your morale, and eventually your life." - Erandra Frostmoon

name: Incendiary Totem
effect: Talent: Elemental
"What be da quickest way to make da Scourge afraid? Light dem on fire, mon." - Kil'zin of the Darkspear

name: Incursion Vestments
effect:
If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn:
[Mage] Hero: 1, [Activate] ==> Draw a card.
[Priest] Hero: 1, [Activate] ==> Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
[Warlock] Hero: 1, [Activate] ==> Target opponent discards a card.

name: Ivan, Bladewind Brute
effect: Talent: Fury
Professions: Blacksmithing, Jewelcrafting
His unbridled rage continued for what seemed like an eternity, as corpse upon corpse fell before the mighty Ivan's blades.

name: Jaroth Lighguard
effect:
Protector
Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
"War is attrition, and they are ill-prepared for what is to come."

name: Jek'kresh
effect:
Protector, Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow ([Shadow]) damage that this ally would be dealt.)
Death Rattle (When this ally enters your graveyard from anywhere): Target ally you control has Shadow Resistance this turn.
"Um, I think we need to change our strategy." - Emerson Zantides

name: Junkboxes Needed
effect:
On your turn: Choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment," and pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card of that kind. He discards that card.
"My rogues need to hone their lockpicking skills, and I need locks of adequate difficulty . . ." - Fahrad

name: Justicar Andaer Ragepaw
effect:
This ally can protect against Death Knights.
When an opposing Death Knight attacks, you may ready this ally.
"Your very existence is an abhorrent defiance against the natural order!"

name: Justicar Broxlo Frostnuggle
effect: Opposing Warriors can't attack or exhaust.
"When are you foolish warriors ever going to learn?"

name: Justicar Gavin Shadesticker
effect: Opposing Warlocks and [Warlock] cards can't ready.
"Warlocks - we're just better off without 'em, laddie."

name: Justicar Maxwell Forthright
effect: Opposing Rogues have -2 / -2.
"I have a very particular set of skills, skills that make me a nightmare for people like you."

name: Kaale
effect: 2, Discard a card ==> Target ally has +2 ATK this turn.
"This is a dangerous opertation, but the results of success are too hard to ignore."

name: Kaerie, Defender of the Sunwell
effect: Talent: Retribution
Professions: Blacksmithing, Inscription
"Retribution is more than just an idea, it is a state of being."

name: Kel'Thuzad
effect:
[Hunter], [Mage], [Rogue], [Warlock], or [Warrior] Hero Required
When your hero becomes Kel'Thuzad, target an opponent. Gain control of an ally he controls. Search his zones for one ally each and put any number of them into play.
"Minions, servants, soldiers of the cold dark. . .obey the call of Kel'Thuzad!"

name: Kilix the Unraveler
effect:
Nerubian Reputation, Protector
When this ally enters play, put up to three cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. Then, draw a card if an ability is in your graveyard, draw a card if an ally is in your graveyardm and draw a card if an equipment is in your graveyard.
"In Arthas, we have a common enemy."

name: King Dred's Helm
effect:
When your hero turns face down, target up to three heroes and/or allies.
[Hunter] Hero: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of them.
[Shaman] Hero: Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
"The previous wearer must have been yummy, for I found this helm in King Dred's tummy." - Grumpherys

name: King Varian Wrynn
effect:
Protector
Opposing heroes and allies have -1/-1 for each different card type you control.
"The time has come to bring retribution for the countless souls lost in Lordaron's fall!"

name: Klannoc Macleod
effect: 1, Put 1 damage on a Warrior you control ==> It has +1 ATK this turn.
"In the end, there can be only one."

name: Kurao Stormheart
effect: When this ally readies, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.
"Don't worry - there's more where that came from."

name: Legendary Leathers, Dalaran
effect: [Activate] ==> You pay 2 less to play your next Leather or Mail armor this turn for each Leatherworking hero and ally you control.
Diane Cannings, Proprietor

name: Levander of the Sanguine Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Professions: Leatherworking, Jewelcrafting
"Practice always makes perfect."

name: Life-Staff of the Web Lair
effect:
Nerubian Reputation
Nerubian allies you control have +1 / +1.
[Activate] ==> Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Nerubian allies you control.
"If Azjol-Nerub is to be freed from the Scourge, you must first eradicate Hadronox." - Kilix the Unraveler

name: Living Bomb
effect: Talent: Fire
"Pop quiz! You've got a bomb attached to your soul. What do you do?" - Riley Sizzleswitch

name: Lord Darion Mograine
effect: 1, Destroy a Death Knight you control ==> Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
"Although our kind have no place in your world, we will fight to bring an end to the Lich King. This I vow."

name: Lord Jorach Ravenholdt
effect: 1, Exhaust a Rogue you control ==> Exhaust target hero or ally.
"All who wish to hone their skills as assassins and thieves are welcome in Ravenholdt Manor."

name: Makta the Rumbler
effect: While you control a Shout, allies you control have +1 / +1, and opposing allies have -1 / -1.
"When I'm through with you, people will think you were run over by a stampede."

name: Maloduri
effect: Talent: Fury
Professions: Blacksmithing, Jewelcrafting
"Nothin' gonna stop the Horde from takin' down the Lich King. Not frost wyrms, not vyrkulNOTHIN'!"

name: Mana Sapphire
effect: Talent: Arcane
If you look close enough, you can see the pure essence of mana swirling beneath the surface.

name: Mardun Valorhearth
effect: Mend 4 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.)
"Perseverance will be key to our ultimate victory."

name: Nourish
effect: Talent: Restoration

effect: Allies you control that share a class with your hero have Assault 1.

name: Petreus Roffe

Shadow Resistance
